short_summary: Provide Dental Ceramic Services to all sites in the Ontario Region.
description: must provide dental laboratory services as requested, including complete, repair, and reline of various types of dentures, as well as other related dental lab services.
full_summary:
**Request for Proposal:** Dental Ceramics
====================================================

### Background
The Correctional Service Canada requires Dental Ceramic Services to be provided to all sites in the Ontario Region.

### Scope of Work
The Successful Proponent must provide the following services:

* Complete, repair, and reline of full upper dentures, including teeth of choice and bite blocks
* Complete, repair, and reline of full lower dentures, including teeth of choice and bite blocks
* Complete and repair of acrylic partial upper dentures (1-12 teeth), including teeth of choice and bite blocks
* Complete and repair of acrylic partial lower dentures (1-12 teeth), including teeth of choice and bite blocks
* Other related dental laboratory services

### Contract Details
* **Reference Number:** cb-99-70340797
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** 4424267B
* **Publication Date:** April 10, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 25, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** April 30, 2029
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Contact Information
 Danielle Murdoch
danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca
(343) 422-4831

### Tender Documents
The tender documents can be downloaded from the following links:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35735/rfp---4424267b.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35735/ddp-4424267b.pdf>
* Dental Ceramics Proposal Document: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35735/npp-dental-ceramics-4424267b.pdf> (English) or <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/35735/npp-4424267b--dental-ceramics---fr_0.pdf> (French) Wednesday, May 15, 2019
====================================================
